sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提貨單是國際貿易和船運中一種很重要的單據。

sentences.english: They want Beijing out of the World Trade Organization.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望中國脫離世界貿易組織。

sentences.english: Either you believe in freedom and middle class trade policies or you dont.
sentences.chinese: 不管你信不信自由和中產階級貿易政策。

sentences.english: It's ethnocentrism that leads to failure in international business.
sentences.chinese: 它的種族優越感從而導致其在國際貿易的失敗。

sentences.english: 2，Is it still a direct barter trade?
sentences.chinese: 這還算是一種直接的易貨貿易嗎？

sentences.english: The part of 3th discusses the role of the theory of comparative advantage for Chinese foreign trade .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分論述了比較優勢理論對中國對外貿易的作用。

sentences.english: The commerce affects our people’s life in so many ways.
sentences.chinese: 這一貿易往來在很多方面影響了兩國人民的生活。

sentences.english: The most watched development. of course. is the threat of trcommerciinge protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 當然，最有目共睹的進展是貿易袒護主義的威迫。

sentences.english: Located most advantageously in the business centre.
sentences.chinese: 上海是中國最大的貿易中心。

sentences.english: The battle lines of the new world order were exposed at the World Trade Organization this week.
sentences.chinese: 本週，新世界秩序的各條戰線在世界貿易組織曝光了。

sentences.english: Then, in 1567, the ban on overseas trade was lifted.
sentences.chinese: 此後，在1567年，海外貿易的禁令解除。

sentences.english: Why do Chinese Chuan Denso are direct trade export business?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼華川電裝做的都是直接貿易出口業務？

sentences.english: By 2010, the trade deficit had dropped to $496 billion.
sentences.chinese: 至2010年，貿易赤字已降至4960億美元。

sentences.english: NO deliver rights, must through the third party to do trade and import or export.
sentences.chinese: 沒有總銷權，必須通過第三方來幹貿易和進出口。

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於桂林山水學院，主修的是國際貿易實務專業。

sentences.english: Then the United States would be cut off from trading directly with China.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們要隔斷美國與中國的直接貿易。

definition: e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
